channel.title: Need help with codding an area
channel.description:
I need a tut on codding a 'chillzone' i people to be able to do ::chillzone to get there. Please help :)
PS: Also, i want a item for staff to make you unable to die. And only A certain person\ player rights to ware it.

item.title: Need help with codding an area
item.description:
@11167 wrote:

I would put:

if (playerEquipment[playerRing] == 2572){ if(IsDead); IsDead = false; NewHP = playerLevel[3]; }

In process() just so it’s being constantly checked.

Read full topic
item.source: Need help with codding an area

Put the ring under the playerEquipment method.

item.title: Need help with codding an area
item.dc:creator: @Owner_Nader Owner Nader
item.description:
@Owner_Nader wrote:

Add This if (command.equals("Chillzone") teleportToX = ToX; teleportToY = ToY; sendMessage("You've teleported to the Chillzone"); }
And add this && playerRights >= 1) { // After if (command.equals("Chillzone") if you want it to be mod+ zone,

Read full topic
item.source: Need help with codding an area

item.title: Need help with codding an area
item.dc:creator: @Adelmas Adelmas
item.description:
@Adelmas wrote:

CHILLZONE

if(command.equalsIgnoreCase("chillzone")) { sM("You have sucsessfully teleported to the Chillzone."); toX = toX here; toY = toY here; }

Here’s the ring that makes you unable to die. We’ll use the ring of wealth.

Here is to spawn the ring:

If you want this for a mod up, make the playerRights 1

if(command.equalsIgnoreCase("adminring")&& playerRights >= 2){ addItem(2572,1); sendMessage("WOOT, an admin ring :O!"); }

Then paste this in

	if (playerEquipment[playerRing] == 2572){ 
        	if(IsDead);
        	IsDead = false;
        	NewHP = playerLevel[3];
        	}

Read full topic
